text:
See attached screenshot.

The default "it works!" page that comes with Tomcat 7 (Installed on Ubuntu 11.10 with apt-get) says that a user with a role of "manager" is required to access the manager. In reality, a user with a role of "manager-gui" is requuired to access the manager.
creator: npsken@gmail.com
npsken@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 28104
Screenshot of the faulty documentation.

Download a version of Tomcat 7.0 from the ASF and compare the two "It works" pages.

The screenshot you provide shows a rather plain page that is not created by the ASF, so you'll need to pursue this with Ubuntu.
creator: bugzilla@pidster.com
